creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: predominately red; woven with thin, predominately white stripes; vertical stitched yarn stripes in multicolors; red tassels overall; three rows of long yarn tassels and one row of short tassels; one end decorated with regularly-spaced buttons--primarily green and white; beaded tassels with yarn and thread ends in multicolors at one short end; long red twisted self fringe at opposite end
dimension: 61 3/4 x 13 7/16 in. (156.85 x 34.13 cm) (without tassels and fringes)
title: Shoulder cloth
